QuestData.Title: Missed Me By Zhat Much!
QuestData.Description: Okay, $r! Zhis just got real!$b$bSomevone zhinks zhat zhey can get rid of me zhat easily, hmm?$b$bVe shall see about zhat! Nozhink can shtop zhis vork! Nozhink!$b$b<Schnottz looks around at the encroaching flames.>$b$bVe should probably get out of here.$b$bHuury up! Time is vastink!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Commander Schnottz when you are ready to accompany him out of the burning building.
QuestData.RewardText: It is times like zhese, zhat one learns who his friends really are...
